verses.roman:
sārvabhauma mahāprabhura paḍilā caraṇe
prabhu tāṅre uṭhāñā kaila āliṅgane

synonyms: sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; mahāprabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; paḍilā—fell down; caraṇe—at the feet; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—him; uṭhāñā—making get up; kaila āliṅgane—embraced.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya fell down at the lotus feet of the Lord, and the Lord pulled him up and embraced him.
